\begin{tikzcd}
	\bullet & \bullet \\
	\bullet & X & Y & Z \\
	& 0 & Z & Z \\
	& {X[1]} & {X[1]}
	\arrow["{(\mathrm{id}_v)^\ast}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{(w')^\ast}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\text{Âèç}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\mathfrak s(1_{X[1]})}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\mathfrak s(w)}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["u"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["v"', from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["v", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{w'}", from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=4-2, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
